title: Stephen Colbert
description: It's a Daily Show reunion! For her season two premiere, Samantha Bee sits down with former colleague Stephen Colbert to discuss everything from covering Joe Biden to cancel culture to colonoscopies. Fun!
author: fullrelease@sambee.com (Samantha Bee)
